questions.text: A small retail shop recorded daily sales (in hundreds of dollars) for 8 days: 15, 12, 10, 18, 20, 14, 16, 15. Find the mean (average) and the median.

ground_truth.method: Sum = 120, n = 8, mean = 120/8 = 15. Ordered data: 10,12,14,15,15,16,18,20; median = average of the two middle values = 15.
